Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT TALENT ELECTRONIC
Reviews.Author: Jose A. Lopez O.
Reviews.Content: SHIPPING WITH ALL WAS WELL AS I GET FROM CHINA OUT OF 27 DAYS, THE DEVICE THAT WORKS FINE IF THERE IS TO LEARN TO USE IT ALREADY PRACTICING WITH THE MANUAL THAT THE CHART NOT UNDERSTAND AND MUCH MORE. ME BOTH WORK WELL AND MOVISTAR MOVILNET CHIPS. IS LIKE A TOY IS EXPENSIVE REMEMBER DICK TRACY WATCH THE YEARS AGO 81 THE POSSIBILITY OF THAT TIME IN A FILM OF 1931. GOOD TO ENJOY.
